name: LD47_The Loop I Stuck In
description:
IMPORTANT - Please Play in Full Screen!!

-----
Anyway enjoy the game! Its an extremely short game about the loop that I stuck in - perhaps the same for you guys.

WSAD / Arrow Keys to move

---

Very Rush Game made in maybe 10 hours (Even less than last year). little time could I have for making this game.
I have to some CC resources for sprites. I do make everything else by myself, especially for music.
Please enjoy the BGM - Might be the only thing I could say 'qualified' for ld jam.
